name: Inge Morath

last_movies.title: Arthur Miller: A Man of His Century

introduction: Ingeborg Hermine "Inge" Morath (About this sound listen (help·info); May 27, 1923 – January 30, 2002) was an Austrian-born American photographer.[2] In 1953, she joined the Magnum Photos Agency, founded by top photographers in Paris, and became a full photographer with the agency in 1955. Morath was also the third and last wife of playwright Arthur Miller; their daughter is screenwriter/director Rebecca Miller.
